name: TRANSPORTATION INSTITUTE
description: A non-profit organization dedicated to maritime research education and promotion
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to Export-Import Bank of the United States.

Funding issues in support of P.L. 480, Food for Peace program; Maritime Security Program (MSP) and Cargo Preference.  Support Vessel Incidental Discharge Act (VIDA) as part of S. 1129, Coast Guard Authorization Act.
Issues related to Puerto Rico Oversight, Management and Economic Stability Act.
Continued support and protection of the Jones Act.  
Issues related to conversion of merchant vessels from diesel to liquefied natural gas (LNG).
Permit issues related to conversion of merchant vessels from diesel fuel to Liquefied Natural Gas.

Support inclusion of Vessel Incidental Discharge Act (VIDA) as part S. 1129, Coast Guard Authorization Act of 2017 or Omnibus Appropriations Act.  Issues related to Puerto Rico Oversight, Management, and Economic Stability Act.  Continued support and protection of the Jones Act.
